# Christian Varisco - Fractional CTO

> Helping early-stage startups build successful products through expert technical leadership.

## About
Christian Varisco is a Fractional CTO based in Italy, specializing in helping early-stage startups navigate technical challenges. With experience working with 15+ startups that have collectively raised over EUR 13 million, Christian provides strategic technical guidance in Product Development, Technology Architecture, and Team Building.

## Services

### Product Strategy
Define which features to develop and when, creating a clear roadmap from idea to market-ready product.

### Technical Leadership
Lead technology decisions, architecture design, and implementation strategies. Build scalable systems that grow with your business.

### Team Building
Find and integrate the right technical talent, whether freelancers or internal hires. Provide direction and mentorship.

## Engagement Details
- Works with maximum 4 startups in parallel to ensure quality focus
- Typical engagement duration: 3-12 months
- Minimum startup budget: EUR 50k-100k for technology investment
- Average time to market: 3-6 months

## Notable Results
- 15+ startups assisted
- EUR 13M+ raised by client startups
- Talentware: EUR 1.2M pre-seed in 3 months
- Lexroom.ai: EUR 500k pre-seed funding
- Liquinvex: Accepted into Nana Bianca accelerator

## Case Studies
Detailed case studies showcasing Christian's work with startups:

### Talentware (HR Tech)
Talent management platform helping businesses engage and retain talent. Achievements: EUR 800k pre-seed raised, paying customers in 3 months.
[Read full case study](https://christianvarisco.com/case-studies/talentware/)

### Liquinvex (Fintech)
Mobile app democratizing wine investment with virtual cellars. Achievements: 100% user base growth, team assembled in 1 week, Nana Bianca accelerator acceptance.
[Read full case study](https://christianvarisco.com/case-studies/liquinvex/)

### Lexroom.ai (Legal Tech)
AI-powered legal research tool for finding sources and drafting opinions. Achievements: EUR 500k pre-seed raised in January 2024.
[Read full case study](https://christianvarisco.com/case-studies/lexroom/)
